glMultiModeDrawArraysIBMFunPtr :: FunPtr (Ptr GLenum -> Ptr GLint -> Ptr GLsizei -> GLsizei -> GLint -> IO ())
glMultiModeDrawArraysIBMFunPtr = unsafePerformIO (getProcAddress "glMultiModeDrawArraysIBM")
